original_text: Then David came to the two hundred men who had been too exhausted to follow David, and who had been left at the brook Besor. And they went out to meet David and to meet the people who were with him. And when David came near to the people he greeted them.
korean_text: 다윗이 전에 피곤하여 능히 자기를 따르지 못하므로 브솔 시내에 머물게 한 이백 명에게 오매 그들이 다윗과 그와 함께 한 백성을 영접하러 나오는지라 다윗이 그 백성에게 이르러 문안하매

sentences.original_text: Then David came to the two hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗은 이백 명의 사람에게 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: who had been too exhausted to follow David
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다윗을 따르기에 너무 지쳐 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and who had been left at the brook Besor.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 브소르 시내에 남겨져 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: And they went out to meet David
and to meet the people who were with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있던 사람들을 맞이하러 나아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: And when David came near to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗이 그 사람들에게 가까이 왔을 때
